org.cougaar.planning.ldm.plan
Interface Preference

All Superinterfaces:
AspectType, java.lang.Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssetPreferenceImpl, PreferenceImpl
public interface Preference
extends AspectType, java.lang.Cloneable

Description of an allocation Preference for a task in the same currency as an allocationresult. Implementations are immutable.
